TAM.description_of_public: The total addressable market includes all motorcycle owners in the global market, which consists of millions of enthusiasts and casual riders who are potential customers for motorcycle accessories.
TAM.justification: The numbers are derived from market research indicating that there are approximately 35 million motorcycle owners globally in 2024, with a steady annual growth rate of about 3% based on industry trends and increasing interest in motorcycle riding. This estimation aligns with data from the Motorcycle Industry Council and other automotive market reports.

industry_example.name: Harley-Davidson
industry_example.description: Harley-Davidson operates within a similar TAM by offering a wide range of accessories and parts tailored for their motorcycle models, targeting millions of motorcycle owners.

SAM.description_of_public: The serviceable available market includes motorcycle owners who are likely to purchase accessories from BMW's network of dealers and online platforms, focusing on BMW motorcycle models and their accessory compatibility.
SAM.justification: The SAM is estimated at around 30% of the TAM, based on the market share of BMW motorcycles and the likelihood of existing BMW owners purchasing accessories. This estimation assumes a stable market presence and growth in the premium motorcycle segment, following trends observed in the motorcycle accessory market.

industry_example.name: BMW Motorrad
industry_example.description: BMW Motorrad focuses on a specific customer base of BMW motorcycle owners, offering tailored accessory bundles that enhance the riding experience.

SOM.description_of_public: The serviceable obtainable market is the segment of the SAM that BMW can realistically capture in the near term through effective marketing and improved dealer relationships.
SOM.justification: The SOM is projected to capture approximately 20% of the SAM initially, with gradual increases as BMW enhances its marketing strategies and dealer support. This projection is based on historical sales growth patterns observed in the motorcycle accessory segment, particularly among premium brands.

industry_example.name: Ducati
industry_example.description: Ducati has successfully captured market share by offering exclusive accessories and enhancing customer relationships through targeted marketing campaigns.
